alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 09 at 1:58PM CDT until July 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Cimarron River Near Forgan 8NNE affecting Meade County. For the Cimarron River...including Forgan 8NNE...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cimarron River Near Forgan 8NNE. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Expect minor overflows of low lying banks along the Cimarron River in southern Meade County on downstream into Oklahoma. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 5.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:00 PM CDT Sunday was 5.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage tomorrow morning to 4.9 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then rise to flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. It will fall for the remainder of the period. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 5.4 feet on 09/19/1969. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 200 AM CDT.
